name: navNote Task Management
description: AI-powered task management app that understands context, time, and location to help you organize your life more efficiently.

audience.description: Perfect for students juggling classes, assignments, extracurricular activities, and social life.
Designed for elderly users who need assistance remembering appointments, medication schedules, and daily tasks.
Ideal for busy professionals managing tight schedules, meetings, deadlines, and work-life balance.
User-friendly for anyone with a smartphone looking to better organize their daily tasks.

itemOffered.name: navNote Free
itemOffered.description: Basic task management with AI assistance and location awareness.

itemOffered.name: navNote Premium
itemOffered.description: Advanced AI features, offline assistant, and unlimited task storage.
